articles.title: Multispecies synbiotic supports weight loss and gut microbiome in obese individuals: RCT - NutraIngredients-Asia
articles.description: Synbiotic supplementation helped improve body composition, antioxidant status, and the gut microbiota of overweight and obese individuals, but had little impact on obesity.
articles.content:
Researchers from Chulalongkorn University in Thailand wanted to build on previous studies looking at the impact of a specific synbiotic combination on obesity.
